oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Revolutionary War Pension Claim, 1832-1834
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Spencer Benson Revolutionary War Pension Claim, 1832-1834
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pension Claim; Military officers; Revolutions
United States--History--Revolution, 1775-1783; Military pensions--United States--Revolution, 1775-1783, [Civil War, 1861-1865, etc.]
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the United States, public pensions got their start with various 'promises', informal and legislated, made to veterans of the Revolutionary War.
